definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: Just like a sea dragon having to fight on land, it will face with difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 就好像龍離開大海到陸地作戰而面臨絕境一樣。

sentences.english: These passions , in a wayward course, over a deep ocean of anguish, reaching to the very verge of despair.
sentences.chinese: 這些激情像颶風，反覆地深重的苦海，瀕於絕境。

sentences.english: U. S. winner Ms. Moore got teary on the brink of elimination ─ Ms.
sentences.chinese: 美國冠軍摩爾曾一度瀕臨絕境而淚流滿面。

sentences.english: The chess-player conceded the game when he saw that his position was hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 棋手一看出自己陷入絕境，就承認那局棋輸了。

sentences.english: We were on the precipice of a global financial crisis one year ago.
sentences.chinese: 一年之前，我們還處在全球金融危機的絕境邊緣。

sentences.english: Unemployment and the death of his youngest daughter nearly drove him into hopeless situation.
sentences.chinese: 失業加上他的小女兒的死亡幾乎把他逼進絕境。

sentences.english: You may be in deep despair, deep trouble, under deep stress.
sentences.chinese: 你可能深陷於絕境，困難重重，壓力很大。

sentences.english: We software developers have a tendency to create dead-end acronyms.
sentences.chinese: 我們這些軟件開發者往往傾向於創造“絕境”縮寫詞。

sentences.english: How did a family that once owned so much find itself in such a corner?
sentences.chinese: 這樣一個一度富可敵國的家族爲何陷入如此絕境？

sentences.english: Ishi Tib are ferocious fighters, especially when cornered.
sentences.chinese: 伊希提卜人是蠻烈的鬥士，處於絕境時尤其如此。

sentences.english: In an ugly replay of the weekend before, Bear Stearns was imperiled again.
sentences.chinese: 和上週末一樣，貝爾斯登再次陷入絕境。

sentences.english: Picasso died, installers cover g life almost in an impasse.
sentences.chinese: 畢加索過世以後，安裝工蓋內克的生活幾乎陷於絕境。

sentences.english: His incompetence have bring us to the brink of ruin.
sentences.chinese: 他很無能已導致我們瀕臨絕境。

sentences.english: They have come to believe in the one true God and Savior, the way from despair to delight.
sentences.chinese: 他們相信那位獨一真神和救主，從絕境進入喜樂之境。

sentences.english: If I spilt my guts, it would make a mess we can't clean up.
sentences.chinese: 對你掏心掏肺，只會讓這一切更糟，陷入絕境。

definition: tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom)/(of a situation) unstable
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
cage/trap (e.g. basket, pit or snare for catching animals)/fig. bonds (of wrong ideas)/shackles (of past misconceptions)/to trap/to shackle
